Description:
Detects the usage of binaries such as 'net', 'sc' or 'powershell' in order to stop, pause, disable or delete critical or important Windows services such as AV, Backup, etc. As seen being used in some ransomware scripts


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), frack113 , X__Junior
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Windows Service Tampering
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((command="* delete *" OR command="* pause *" OR command="* stop *" OR command="*Stop-Service *" OR command="*Remove-Service *") (command="*config*" command="*start=disabled*")) (command="*143Svc*" OR command="*Acronis VSS Provider*" OR command="*AcronisAgent*" OR command="*AcrSch2Svc*" OR command="*AdobeARMservice*" OR command="*AHS Service*" OR command="*Antivirus*" OR command="*Apache4*" OR command="*ARSM*" OR command="*aswBcc*" OR command="*AteraAgent*" OR command="*Avast Business Console Client Antivirus Service*" OR command="*avast! Antivirus*" OR command="*AVG Antivirus*" OR command="*avgAdminClient*" OR command="*AvgAdminServer*" OR command="*AVP1*" OR command="*BackupExec*" OR command="*bedbg*" OR command="*BITS*" OR command="*BrokerInfrastructure*" OR command="*CASLicenceServer*" OR command="*CASWebServer*" OR command="*Client Agent 7.60*" OR command="*Core Browsing Protection*" OR command="*Core Mail Protection*" OR command="*Core Scanning Server*" OR command="*DCAgent*" OR command="*dwmrcs*" OR command="*EhttpSr*" OR command="*ekrn*" OR command="*Enterprise Client Service*" OR command="*epag*" OR command="*EPIntegrationService*" OR command="*EPProtectedService*" OR command="*EPRedline*" OR command="*EPSecurityService*" OR command="*EPUpdateService*" OR command="*EraserSvc11710*" OR command="*EsgShKernel*" OR command="*ESHASRV*" OR command="*FA_Scheduler*" OR command="*FirebirdGuardianDefaultInstance*" OR command="*FirebirdServerDefaultInstance*" OR command="*FontCache3.0.0.0*" OR command="*HealthTLService*" OR command="*hmpalertsvc*" OR command="*HMS*" OR command="*HostControllerService*" OR command="*hvdsvc*" OR command="*IAStorDataMgrSvc*" OR command="*IBMHPS*" OR command="*ibmspsvc*" OR command="*IISAdmin*" OR command="*IMANSVC*" OR command="*IMAP4Svc*" OR command="*instance2*" OR command="*KAVFS*" OR command="*KAVFSGT*" OR command="*kavfsslp*" OR command="*KeyIso*" OR command="*klbackupdisk*" OR command="*klbackupflt*" OR command="*klflt*" OR command="*klhk*" OR command="*KLIF*" OR command="*klim6*" OR command="*klkbdflt*" OR command="*klmouflt*" OR command="*klnagent*" OR command="*klpd*" OR command="*kltap*" OR command="*KSDE1.0.0*" OR command="*LogProcessorService*" OR command="*M8EndpointAgent*" OR command="*macmnsvc*" OR command="*masvc*" OR command="*MBAMService*" OR command="*MBCloudEA*" OR command="*MBEndpointAgent*" OR command="*McAfeeDLPAgentService*" OR command="*McAfeeEngineService*" OR command="*wbengine*" OR command="*WdNisSvc*" OR command="*WeanClOudSve*" OR command="*Weems JY*" OR command="*WinDefend*" OR command="*wmms*" OR command="*wozyprobackup*" OR
